faucet.title: Afajores Testnet Faucet
faucet.text: If you already have a testnet account, faucet yourself to get more Test Celo Dollars

payments.title: Send and Request Payments
payments.text: Account start with 10 cUSD of Testnet funds. Try sending and requesting payments. Use the faucet page if you run out.

exchange.title: Exchange cUSD and CELO
exchange.text: Check the exchange rate and swap between Celoâ€™s stable coin (cUSD) and variable value token (CELO) as you see fit.

haveAccount: Already have an Alfajores testnet account?
